pageContext.title: Our app, SoCash, lets users withdraw cash from shops. AMA!
pageContext.content:
NOTE: This AMA has ended. Find the Q&A with Wee Leong in the comments!

Hi TIA Community,

Iâ€™m Wee Leong, head of network growth at SoCash,Â a mobile app that lets users withdraw cash from shops and get rewarded for it. Our goal is to improve cash distribution and liquidity management by creating the largest mobile-powered cash network in the world. My core role is to grow the network of shops that supports SoCash, which is a mix of operations and business development.

Before SoCash, I spent 12 years in various roles in digital banking, including nine years at Citibank and two at DBS Bank. I started at Citibank in a sales/service support role while studying to pay for my university fees, which kickstarted my career in banking. I also had a three-year stint in the energy industry.

Feel free to ask me questions such as:

  • What is it like leaving banks to work in a startup?
  • What is my day-to-day like?
  • What are your hobbies?

Note fromÂ Putra, TIAâ€™s head of community content:Â The host may choose at his preference to not answer particular questions. The AMA is moderated by the community managers, so letâ€™s keep the questions friendly.Â ðŸ™‚

seo.title: I'm Wee Leong, head of network growth at SoCash. AMA!
seo.description: Wee Leong is the head of network growth at SoCash. Ask him anything!
